1.0.80.name: wordpress/contextly-related-links
1.0.80.description: Contextly is a premium related stories service for sites that care about their content. Unlike many other related links plugins, Contextly does not tax your Wordpress database and operates as "Software-as-a-Service." Currently Contextly is an invite-only beta used on sites such as Wired.com. If you are interested in learning more, please sign up on our site or e-mail us at info@contextly.com.
